main.name: Full Stack Developer Dipankar
main.description: I am a Fullstack Developer I have work experience in the area of Python as a primary field were hands-on experience in Tkinter, Django framework, Flask framework, Django REST framework and also hand-on experience in other fields like React Native, React JS Framework, Ionic framework and Angular framework.
main.bio: Focused and quick-learning a Fullstack Developer, I have around 6.5 years of work experience in the area of Python as a primary field were hands-on experience in Tkinter, Django framework, Flask framework, Django REST framework and also hand-on experience in other fields like React Native, React JS Framework, Ionic framework and Angular framework.
